about_the_game:
The Blackout Zone is a world where progress has left some behind, creating a landscape of decay and desperation. With thousands of additional tiles at your disposal, you can create a forgotten district filled with ramshackle buildings, neglected structures, and the haunting remains of a techno-god temple, once revered but now abandoned. Whether you're crafting a slum overrun by gangs or a district left to decay by corporate neglect, this pack provides the tools to bring your dystopian vision to life (or what passes for it anyway).

This asset pack contains more than 2,280 tiles to augment your Cybercity needs.

In here you will find a huge variety of tiles including:

* Buildings, shacks, lean-tos, and makeshift shelters
* Dilapidated AC units, air-scrubbers, and more
* Tons of junk, garbage, debris, and other refuse and clutter
* Fences, makeshift barriers, and barricades
* Containers, barrels, boxes, shelves, racks, and crates
* Tiles to create a technogod temple
* Furniture, chairs, computer stations, stoves, tables, etc
* Food (illegally grown, don’t let Central Security find out!)
* Mechanical add-ons, generators, fuse boxes, fuel tanks, etc
* Grass, plants, crops, vines, ground textures, etc
* Interior floods, walls, and stairs (fully compatible with other Cybercity and RPGTools for endless mixing and matching).
* And much more!

These tiles are fully compatible with all other PVGames tiles from the RPGTools line of assets. They go together especially well with the Doomsday assets.

*Please note that the tiles in this pack are not formatted as tilesheets. They are all individual PNG graphics

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
